backend/main.mo: Stores contact messages and provides methods to submit and retrieve them with basic validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist outlining backend-first deployment flow and validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens for the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/public/elementor/README-element: Guide for embedding the static 3D cafe build into WordPress via Elementor with setup steps and limitations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring the 3D scene, overlays, navigation UI, and onboarding logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContourFr: UI frame component applying contour-themed background texture and styled container.
frontend/src/components/layout/PanelSurf: Reusable panel layout with header, close button, scrollable content, and contour framing.
frontend/src/components/nav/HelpButton.t: Floating help button showing a tooltip and triggering the onboarding overlay.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo and buttons to open menu, about, contact, and export panels.
frontend/src/components/overlays/Onboard: Dialog overlay explaining movement, gaze, proximity, and interaction tips for first‑time users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstVisitFlag.ts: Tracks whether the user is visiting for the first time using localStorage and provides a dismiss handler.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and submitting contact messages using the backend actor with validation and diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, fonts, color variables, and motion preferences for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPanel.tsx: Renders an about panel describing the cafe's mission, community, and location in a sliding sheet UI.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPanel.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation and submission plus displays alternate contact options.
frontend/src/pages/ExportPanel.tsx: Displays download options and installation instructions for exporting the site as a WordPress‑ready static package.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPanel.tsx: Renders a slide-in menu panel with tabbed categories and a list of menu items. Includes a MenuItem component for displaying item details.
frontend/src/scene/CafeScene.tsx: Sets up the 3D cafe scene with lighting, physics, environment, navigation controls, and interactions. Wraps content in Suspense and optionally disables OrbitControls when navigating.
frontend/src/scene/controls/useCafeNavig: Implements first-person navigation using keyboard and mouse with pointer lock. Updates camera movement, rotation, and boundary constraints each frame.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeEnvir: Builds the physical cafe environment including floor, walls, furniture, decor, and physics floor plane. Imports and places multiple detailed furniture components.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeFurni: Defines reusable 3D furniture components like counters, tables, chairs, and stools using basic geometries and textures. Each component returns grouped meshes with materials and positions.
frontend/src/scene/environment/CafeScene: Adds decorative props such as an espresso machine, grinder, pastry case, cups, and wall menu. Uses simple meshes to dress the scene with small details.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/DoorCont: Controls an auto-opening door that rotates based on camera distance. Smoothly animates door rotation each frame.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Inspecta: Creates an interactive prop the user can drag to rotate, highlighting when active. Displays an HTML hint overlay while inspecting.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Interact: Aggregates all scene interactions including POIs, proximity zones, door control, inspectables, and panel triggers. Passes the camera and activation callbacks to child interaction components.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/PanelPro: Displays floating interactive 3D props like cards, cups, or signs with hover/press animations. Clicking triggers a provided callback and shows a label via 3D text.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/POIMarke: Renders interactive 3D POI markers with hover and dwell-based activation tied to camera gaze. Handles scaling, highlighting, and triggering UI panels through poiRegistry.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/poiRegis: Contains a registry of POIs with positions, labels, actions, and highlight colors. Used by POIMarkers to render and activate POI interactions.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/Proximit: Defines proximity-based trigger zones that react when the camera enters them. Shows an on-screen prompt to activate a related UI panel.
frontend/src/scene/interactions/ScenePan: Places several PanelProp objects in the scene for menu, about, and contact interactions. Each prop triggers its corresponding panel on click.
frontend/src/scene/materials/contourStyl: Provides helper functions to create styled Three.js materials like contour, wood, and metal. Exports a set of predefined contour color tokens.
frontend/src/state/uiOverlayStore.ts: Zustand store managing which UI panel is active. Exposes setter for updating the active panel type.
frontend/src/theme/motion.ts: Defines timing, easing, and spring presets for motion animations. Includes a utility to generate CSS transition strings.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Exports design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, and radii. Used to maintain consistent theme styling across the app.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Provides error logging utilities with remediation hints for deployment and actor issues. Includes helpers to classify type-mismatch and actor-initialization errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining color variables, fonts, animations, and plugins. Extends theme with custom design tokens and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for an interactive 3D cafe site, outlining features, architectural notes, and known deployment issues. Contains metadata and a list of implemented features for planning and tracking.
